resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/78142</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78142</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40aee8f7-9a04-4354-2789-8b57d7c37e52#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szentháromság a halott Krisztussal, 1450 körül, Magyar Nemzeti Galéria, 64,5x54,3 cm, festett fa.</string>
            <string language="en">The Holy Trinity with the dead Christ, about 1450, Hungarian National Gallery, 64,5x54,3 cm, painted wood.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die heilige Dreiheit mit dem toten Christ, 
ungefähr 1450, ungarische nationale Galerie, 64,5x54,3 Zentimeter, 
gemaltes Holz.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La trinité sainte avec le Christ mort, environ 
1450, galerie nationale hongroise, 64,5x54,3 centimètre, bois peint.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O trinity holy com o Christ inoperante, 
aproximadamente 1450, galeria nacional hungarian, 64,5x54,3 cm, 
madeira pintada.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La trinità santa con il Christ guasto, circa 
1450, galleria nazionale ungherese, 64,5x54,3 centimetro, legno 
verniciato.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ιερή τριάδα με το νεκρό Χριστό, περίπου 1450, 
ουγγρική εθνική στοά, 64,5x54,3 εκατ., χρωματισμένο ξύλο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La trinidad santa con el Cristo muerto, cerca de 
1450, galería nacional húngara, 64,5x54,3 centímetro, madera 
pintada.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az Atyaisten maga előtt tartja a meggyötört testű Krisztust, felettük a Szentlélek galambja. Térdkép.</string>
            <string language="en">God the Father holds the tortured-bodied Christ in front of himself, the Holy Ghost's pigeon above them. Medium long shot.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">táblakép,  15.század,  Magyar Nemzeti Galéria,  szentháromság,  </string>
            <string language="en">panel picture, 15th century, Hungarian National Gallery, the Holy Trinity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gott der Vater hält den gequälten-bodied Christ vor, die
Taube des heiligen Geistes über ihnen an. Mittlerer langer 
Schuß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dieu le père tient le Christ torturé-bodied devant se, 
le pigeon d'ordinateur de secours saint au-dessus d'eux. Long 
projectile moyen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O deus o pai prende o Christ torturado-bodied na frente 
dhimself, o pombo de ghost holy acima deles. Tiro longo médio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il dio il padre gli tiene il Christ torturato -bodied, il 
piccione del fantasma santo sopra loro. Colpo lungo medio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Θεός ο πατέρας κρατά το βασανίζω-ένσωματωμένο 
Χριστό μπροστά από τον, το περιστέρι του ιερού φαντάσματος 
επάνω από τους. Μέσο μακρύ πλάνο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El dios el padre sostiene a Cristo torturado -bodied 
delante de se, la paloma del fantasma santo sobre ellos. Tiro 
largo medio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">täfeln Sie Abbildung, 15. Jahrhundert, ungarische nationale 
Galerie, die heilige Dreiheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lambrissez l'image, le 15ème siècle, galerie nationale 
hongroise, la trinité sainte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apainele o retrato, 1ö século, galeria nacional hungarian, o 
trinity holy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rivesta l'immagine di pannelli, il quindicesimo secolo, la 
galleria nazionale ungherese, la trinità santa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εικόνα επιτροπής, 15$ος αιώνας, ουγγρική εθνική στοά, η 
ιερή τριάδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">artesone el cuadro, décimo quinto siglo, galería nacional 
húngara, la trinidad santa</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
